metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6401 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Jansson, possibly 2.4 and earlier, does not restrict the ability to triggerhash collisions predictably, which allows context-dependent attackers tocause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted JSON document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjansson4 - 2.5-2ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jansson package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5-2ubuntu0.1').
